message: You can create one by clicking on "Create Topic"... input the topic name and then start talking about it
you can reply by hovering over the post you want to reply to and clicking the curved arrow symbol
you can see our mentions by clicking mention... these are the direct replies or comments to or about you (similar to twitter)
if someone replies, the notification will appear at the top of the page in the menu bar or you will receive an email
Ok, so this is your basic topic. Anyone in the group can reply to it.
If you need more help... just post it in this thread
you can like a post by hovering over it and click the little star next to the user info
You can delete a post by hovering over the post and clicking on the x
you cn discover other groups by clicking discover
you can write a direct message to someone by putting @ before their name... similar to twitter
